alert.note: Alert for Inyo (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 13 at 11:10AM PDT until March 15 at 12:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of southeast California, including the following county, Inyo. * WHEN...Until 1100 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Rises in small streams and normally dry washes. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1110 AM PDT, California Highway Patrol reports water over Highway 136 from the Owens River. Minor flooding is already occurring. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Highway 136 east of Lone Pine. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
